stripBadWords

Description

Abstract parser class that must be extended for creating custom parsing engines for Discuss Posts. Never instantiate directly.

Properties

parse
jump to class

parse( string $message ) : string

Abstract parse method that is run for each post before rendering. Must be defined in any derivative classes of disParser and determines the parsing of the post.

Arguments
$message
string
Output
string
The parsed content
